title: If a Pendulum Monster's Flip Summon is negated, what happens to it?
question: If Performapal Momoncarpet's Flip Summon is negated, where will Performapal Momoncarpet go as a result?
answer:
Performapal Momoncarpet will be added to the Extra Deck face-up.

If a Flip Summon is negated, the monster in question is destroyed while in the Monster Zone. Therefore, since it is a Pendulum Monster, it will be added face-up to the Extra Deck.
llm_answer: Performapal Momoncarpet will be sent to the Graveyard. When a Flip Summon is negated, the monster is treated as if it was not successfully Summoned, and thus it is sent to the Graveyard.
